input.sentences: i went on a trip to the countryside . i found this sign quite funny .
[female] did n't want her picture taken .
the hydrant and hose box stood in stark contrast to each other .
i climbed way up high to the top of a summit and took this picture of a lighthouse .
output.sentences: I always find it fun in trips to take pictures of funny signs.
And also pictures of beautiful females along the way.
My favorite kind of trip are to places where the ocean is nearby.
I stood stark still almost like the fire hydrant.
The top of the summit was a beautiful place for a picture.
